attributes.description:
Don't wait, call now to book your test drive....
All our vehicles undergo a Dekra Condition Report and an EXTRA quality check at our workshop for that peace of mind motoring. The one thing we pride ourselves in more than anything is EXCELLENT CUSTOMER SERVICE. Come and join our Nissan Parow Family where trust and service are our main focus. We will tailor make a package that will suit your needs. We deal through all major financial institutions and always pride ourselves on giving you the best deal. CALL NOW and one of our experienced and professional Sales Executives will gladly bring the vehicle out to you or welcome you here on our safe and spacious showroom. Contact the Motus Nissan Parow TEAM NOW!

attributes.description: KIA PINETOWN we pride ourselves on delivering quality Pre- Owned vehicles, belonging to a multinational company who is South Africa's biggest motor group which owns 340 dealers country wide. All our vehicles have to pass a DEKRA Condition Report, DEKRA roadworthy certificate and an 125 point  quality check at our workshop for your peace of mind motoring. We will tailor make a finance package that will suit your pocket. Kia Pinetown can offer extended warranties and service plans on all vehicles. Trade in's accepted and nationwide delivery can be arranged, call now, one of our Sales executives will gladly bring the vehicle out to you or welcome you with a warm cup of coffee at our dealership.

attributes.description: We at KIA RANDBURG pride ourselves on delivering quality used vehicles to our clients. All our vehicles undergo a 125 quality point check,  DEKRA roadworthy and valet before being displayed on our showroom floor. All vehicles are delivered with a full service history and are accident free. We believe in EXCELLENT CUSTOMER SERVICE. We will tailor make a DEAL that will not only suit your needs but your pocket too. We have In-House finance options with all major financial institutions and always pride ourselves on giving you the best deal. CALL NOW and one of our experienced Sales Executives will gladly assist you in making your dreams come TRUE.

attributes.description:
Renault Kwid Kwid 1.0 Dynamique / Zen 5dr
Stunning 2021 Kwid in fantastic condition. Full service history. Central locking, aircon, airbag, power steering, radio with bluetooth. Reverse camera and sensors for parking assistance. Electric windows and mirrors. Manual transmission and a comfortable drive for all your transporting needs. Great fuel consumption. Visit your KIA Konfidence dealership in the Westrand, situated in Wilropark, Roodepoort and book this 1.0 Dynamique Kwid for a test drive. Nationwide delivery.
